lead_paragraph: Liverpool is willing to play Maccabi Haifa in Champions League qualifying matches as long as the games are held outside Israel. A draw yesterday pitted the clubs next month. On Thursday, UEFA asked Israel for safety guarantees in holding soccer matches because of the unrest in the Middle East.
